data.name: Train Mechanic Simulator VR Demo
data.detailed_description: Demo version of Train Mechanic Simulator VR. Take your chances as a real train mechanic in VR. Find locomotives in need of help and repair them in one of the 3 workshops located in a vast open world covering the area of over 6,000 acres. You will face all kinds of damages in all sorts of trains: diesel, electric and even old-school steam units
data.about_the_game: Demo version of Train Mechanic Simulator VR. Take your chances as a real train mechanic in VR. Find locomotives in need of help and repair them in one of the 3 workshops located in a vast open world covering the area of over 6,000 acres. You will face all kinds of damages in all sorts of trains: diesel, electric and even old-school steam units
data.short_description: Take your chances as a real train mechanic in VR. Find locomotives in need of help and repair them in one of the 3 workshops located in a vast open world covering the area of over 6,000 acres. You will face all kinds of damages in all sorts of trains: diesel, electric and even old-school steam units
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Polish, Russian, Hungarian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
